TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_magal, title = magal, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/magal} }

S.FORM: magal nwahan myan magal ina na yutas Losin, blaq balay qu ina qasa, qnyat ru si shhway inlungan nya.
magal nwahan myan magal ina na yotas Losin, blaq balay qo ina qasa, qnyat ro si shhway inlongan nya.
